data.title: Golf, Party Venue, Sports Bar & Restaurant
data.meta_description: Make socializing a sport at one of our premier entertainment venues featuring fun golf games for all skill levels, full-service bar and restaurant, all-weather hitting bays and private event spaces.
data.text:
PLAY TIME LIMIT: To reduce the wait time and ensure everyone gets an opportunity to play, at peak times we operate a 2-hour play time limit.

ENTRY CONDITIONS: Anyone under the age of 16 must be accompanied by an adult (18+) at all times. From 10pm, Topgolf Glasgow is an 18+ venue, and we operate a Challenge 25 policy.
